Activity: Wake up, review overnight market activity to maintain general awareness.
Check emails, respond to urgent requests. Review yesterday's progress and agenda for the day.
Meeting with @devops-1 and @qres-1 to discuss infrastructure requirements. Gather their input on data volume, velocity, variety, and veracity. Discuss scalability and redundancy requirements.
Based on the meeting, revise the technology infrastructure plan. Begin outlining the data pipeline, from raw data feeds to processed signals for trading.
Lunch. Discuss potential architectural solutions with @sdev-1 and @sdev-2.
Document specifications for the required data feeds. Define the data format, frequency, latency requirements, and data sources for each feed.  Include examples and edge cases.

Email @dsde-1 and @dsde-2 to review the data feed specifications. Request feedback on data quality, availability, and potential alternative data sources. @dsde-1 @dsde-2 Topic: Data Feed Specifications Review
Research and evaluate potential vendors for market data feeds. Compare pricing, data quality, and API capabilities.
End of workday. Read research papers related to statistical arbitrage.
